item.title: Bridge returned error 400! (18719)
item.content:encoded:
Twitter @Sanctuary4AllCO was unable to receive or process the remote website's content!
Error message: `The requested resource cannot be found!
Please make sure your input parameters are correct!
cUrl error: (0)
PHP error: `
Query string: `action=display&bridge=Twitter&context=By+username&u=Sanctuary4AllCO&norep=on&nopic=on&noimg=on&format=Atom`
Version: `dev.2020-02-26`

  • Press Return to check your input parameters
  • Press F5 to retry
  • Check if this issue was already reported on GitHub (give it a thumbs-up)
  • Open a GitHub Issue if this error persists

item.title: Tania is selling enchiladas rojas this weekend to raise money to...
item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.

Tania is selling enchiladas rojas this weekend to raise money to pay for her residency. They’re $15 per plate. Pickup is available in Denver and Boulder. Order at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co
item.author: Sanctuary4All Colorado

item.title: Tania is selling enchiladas rojas con queso this weekend to...
item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

Tania is selling enchiladas rojas con queso this weekend to raise money for her residency application. She moved to the US with her mother as a child and is a DACA recipient, which has allowed her to pursue education, work, and have more stability with her family. But DACA doesn’t provide a pathway to citizenship, and it’s protection, by nature, is temporary. Securing her residency will give Tania and her family more stability. You can support her in that process by ordering at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co.
item.author: Sanctuary4All Colorado

item.title: We're a little over 60 emails away from our goal -- please...
item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

We're a little over 60 emails away from our goal -- please help us show the house judiciary committee that Coloradans across the state agree: no one should face detention and deportation without access to a lawyer: bit.ly/VoteYesOnHB21-1194
----
Estamos a poco más de 60 correos electrónicos de nuestro objetivo help por favor ayúdenos a mostrarle al Comité Judicial de la cámara que los habitantes de Colorado en todo el estado están de acuerdo: nadie debe enfrentar detención y sin acesso a un abogado: bit.ly/VoteYesOnHB21-1194
item.author: Sanctuary4All Colorado

item.title: Jeanette & Edna are making burritos next weekend! All of the...
item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All Colorado is in Boulder, Colorado.

Jeanette & Edna are making burritos next weekend! All of the money raised will go toward our emergency fund in case someone is detained or in immediate need of a lawyer. You can support by ordering at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co.

Photo by @traeben1717, who is working alongside several folks to create a documentary about the #SolidarityMeals program.
Director: Tyler Borkowski @little_bork_man
Producer: Chloe Halvorson @uunga.bunga...
Director of Photography: Trae Beneck @traeben1717
Lead Journalist: Karen Manley @karennmanley
Translator: Luis Castro Ortega

item.title: Families Sanctuary for All Please help us to support immigrant...
item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

Families Sanctuary for All Please help us to support immigrant families in these hard times now that their legal costs remain and to help them provide for some things such as food or any other indispensable necessities now that some have lost their jobs because of COVID-19. Please donate what you can Vemo @Sanctuary-4-All. Por favor ayuda o apoya a familias immigrantes ya que sus costos legales en sus procesos de deportación continúan y para apoyar con algunas cosas indispensables como comida o algunos gastos de utilidades ya que con este problema del COVID-19 algunos perdieron su empleo o los descansaron por tiempo indefinido Dona a Vemo @Sanctuary-4-All

item.title: Edna is selling flautas & tacos dorados next weekend!...
item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

Edna is selling flautas & tacos dorados next weekend! She’s raising money to hire a lawyer for her son’s immigration case once it gets closer to his court date. You can support here: https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co. Unlike in criminal proceedings, people in immigration court have no right to a lawyer, and so anyone who cannot afford one must represent themselves. There are some local stopgap programs, such as the Rocky Mountain Immigrant Advocacy Network, which provides ...free legal services to people in immigrant detention, and the Denver Immigrant Legal Services Fund, which pays immigration attorneys to represent people who would otherwise be unable to obtain a lawyer (disappointingly, the Aurora City Council recently voted not to establish a similar immigrant legal defense fund). Our goal is to create a world where immigration courts don’t exist at all, but while they’re here, we will demand for and help fund legal representation for everyone we can.

#solidaritymeals #sanctuary4all #abolishice #abolishprisons #mutualaid

See More
item.author: Sanctuary4All Colorado

item.content:encoded:

item.title: We are postponing pickups for solidarity meals due to inclement...
item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

We are postponing pickups for solidarity meals due to inclement weather until next saturday 3/20. We are sorry for the inconvenience but we want you all to stay safe and off the roads! We are messaging everyone individually to ensure you are able to collect next Saturday and if not we will do our best to accommodate! Thank you for all of your support and stay warm!
item.author: Sanctuary4All Colorado

item.title: Yessenia is back for this weekend's solidarity meals with...
item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.

Yessenia is back for this weekend's solidarity meals with her very popular pupusas! Yessenia is a beloved leader of Sanctuary4All who, like many of you, has been disappointed in the Biden administration so far as they have failed to make immediate restoration to the communities Trump harmed. This includes our own Democratic senator John Hickenlooper, who has not used his new position to provide aid to immigrants like many other Democratic politicians have in other states. It continues to be up to communities to protect and fight for each other rather than the people our taxes pay to represent us to do their job & serve us. We depend on each other. You can help support Yessenia and her family this weekend by ordering at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co
item.author: Sanctuary4All Colorado

Sanctuary4All Colorado

Justice

item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

This Saturday Solidary Meals

Sanctuary4All Colorado is in Boulder, Colorado.

Yessenia is selling pupusas this weekend! She’s been a leader in coordinating the Solidarity Meals program, & she and her husband hope to open their own restaur...ant someday. You can support that dream by ordering at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co. For pick up in Denver 1400 N Lafayette St Denver Co 80218 and pick up Boulder 5001 Pennsylvania Ave. Boulder Co 80303 time for pick up 1 pm thank all fir continue support immigrant families
